functions.function_ast:
FuncDef(

              quals=[],

              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        Decl(
          name='x',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='x',
              quals=[],

              type=
                IdentifierType(

                )
            )
          init=
            Constant(

            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        While(
          cond=

              left=

                )

            )
          stmt=

              block_items[0]=

                    )
                  args=

                      exprs[0]=

                        )
                    )
                )

                        )

        )
